damage_calculator.title: Archero Damage Calculator
damage_calculator.author: u/raytheblue
damage_calculator.description: Comprehensive damage calculation spreadsheet for Archero with detailed formulas and data entry sections

categories.hero_stats: Base hero attack and powerup calculations
categories.runes: Courage rune flat and percentage bonuses
categories.medals: Worthy Warrior and other medal bonuses
categories.monster_eggs: Boss monster egg bonuses (Arch Leader, Medusa, Skeleton King, etc.)

usage_instructions: Make a copy of the spreadsheet to input your own data
Key in data in the specified sections
White cells are calculated by formula automatically
Use for comparing current vs new equipment/rune setups
Take note of specific rows when checking to swap runes
